Class Disk

    • com.microsoft.azure.management.compute.models.Disk

extends Object

      • getSourceImage

        public VirtualHardDisk getSourceImage()
        Optional. Gets or sets the Source User Image VirtualHardDisk. This VirtualHardDisk will be copied before using it to attach to the Virtual Machine.If SourceImage is provided, the destination VirtualHardDisk should not exist.
        Returns:
        The SourceImage value.
